name: XHP-CMS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: XHP CMS - eXpandable Home Page is an easy to install, easy to use, easy to expand content management system (CMS) written in PHP and using MySQL as the database engine.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<meta name="GENERATOR" content="XHP - eXpandable Home Page v([\d\.]+)"\/>)
(?-mix:<a href="http:\/\/xhp.targetit.ro\/">Powered by XHP CMS v([\d\.]+)<\/a><br\/><a href="http:\/\/lars.targetit.ro\/">Site engine is copyright)
